meanings.def: the liquid that comes from fruit or vegetables; a drink made from this
examples: Add the juice of two lemons.

meanings.def: the liquid that comes out of a piece of meat when it is cooked
examples: Use the juices of the meat to make gravy.

meanings.def: the liquid in the stomach that helps you to digest food

examples: My phone has run out of juice.
